Learning Outcomes
LO1 – Assess cloud solutions and specifications for Azure cloud computing.
LO2 - Develop an implementation plan for implementing Azure clouding computing
LO3 - Develop review processes to resolve Azure cloud computing implementation issues.
Duration: 3 days (24 hrs),
Instructional methods: Lecture (11 hrs), Didactic Questioning, Demonstration, Practical (11 hrs)
Assessment method: WA-SAQ (1 hr), PP (1 hr)
Course Mapping
TSC – Cloud Computing ICT-DIT-4020-1.1
TSC Knowledge
K1: Requirements for implementation of cloud solutions
K2: Impact analysis techniques for cloud solutions
K3: Types of cloud platform integration tools and techniques
K4: Range of installation tests and techniques for cloud solutions
K5: Steps to align existing systems with cloud computing components
K6: Elements and functioning of automated software deployment
K7: Scripting and programming languages
K8: Big data tools and techniques
K9: Range of cloud computing platforms, software and services
TSC Ability
A1: Assess the performance of cloud solutions based on expected business needs, usage and traffic volume
A2: Draft specifications for  cloud solutions to address usage, performance and security requirements
A3: Develop implementation plans for implementing cloud solutions
A4: Develop processes for the review of metrics associated with implementation of cloud solutions
A5: Resolve escalated issues related to implementation of cloud solutions
